name: No Coins Allowed
description:
My Ludum Dare 40 entry.

Refer to the "Help" page within the game for controls and basic guidance.

No Coins Allowed is a 2D platformer inspired off of many 2000s flash games and more. In this game, you must NOT collect coins. The more coins you have, the less time you have to complete each level.

There are 30 levels, not including an opening level and a final boss level.
Yeah, this game has a final boss. Didn't exactly plan that one.
